## Dataset: Credit Card Customer Churn

### Business Context
A consumer credit card bank is experiencing customer attrition.\
The objective of this dataset is to understand factors associated with
customer churn and to build predictive models identifying customers
at risk of leaving.

### Source
The dataset was obtained from Kaggle:
Credit Card Customer Churn Dataset (publicly available).

### Description
- Observations: ~10,000 customers
- Features: demographic, account, and transaction-related variables
- Target variable: Attrition_Flag (binary indicator of churn)

### Notes on Usage
The raw dataset is not included in this repository to keep the project
lightweight and focused on methodology and interpretation.
The data can be downloaded directly from Kaggle by users wishing to
reproduce the analysis.
